item.title: PowerBI Notes
item.description: i said I’ll study | just show up Resource: https://blueapache.udemy.com/course/15-days-of-power-bi Quick notes Basic data cleanup Transform data Opens Query Editor Applied steps: like undo/redo (but there’s no undo/redo feature here) can be reconfigured on gear icon, or delete Promote first row as headers: Remove blank rows: doesn’t delete rows if there’s any row that has even 1 item (like ID but others are already blank) can be filtered tho like this: Remove Duplicates don’t select any column before doing this so it looks unique value across rows if you do this whilst a column is selected, it will base unique values on that specific column Data types ensure data types are configured so computation would be correct (ie you can’t compute a string, it has to be whole or dec) for dates, you might need to use a different locale Use replace value for errors if needed

item.title: PowerShell
item.description: OR: i said I’ll study Fundamentals Variables - store values and use as arguments Functions - list of statements or reusable commands Flow Control - If, ElseIf, Else Loops - ForEach, Do-While, Do Error handling - Try, Catch, Finally Expressions - operators and operands, computation - Expressions - PowerShell | Microsoft Docs Scope Global Scope - continues to exist after session ends Script Scope - no longer exists after file is finished running.

item.title: PowerShell - Extract Zip to path
item.description: Extract zip to path PowerShell 1 2 3 if(!(Test-Path -Path "$env:TEMP\Profile")){ Expand-Archive .\Profile.zip -DestinationPath $env:TEMP -Force } tech notes
